title: What is "cast the pressed spell upon pressing another spell" option used for?
body: In the video i used brand's combo of W Q E, but with both options i still only get W and E. DId i misunderstood the option completely? If yes, what is it supposed to do?

replies.body: The option is basically for smart casting with the addition of range indicators.  If you press your ability you will see an indicator, and if you press another while holding it then it will switch to the next ability indicator with this option.  Sorry for any confusion!
